Package pddl4j.exp

This package contains the classes relative to the PDDL expressions.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Exp This interface is implemented by all expression of the PDDL language.
InitEl This interface is implements by all expression that can be used in the PDDL language in the initial state description.
Literal This interface defines a literal in the PDDL language.
 

Class Summary
AbstractExp This abstract class implements the common part of all PDDl expression.
AndExp This abstract generic class is implemented by all conjunctive PDDL expression.
AtomicFormula This class implements a atomic formula of the PDDL langage.
DerivedPredicate This class implements a derived predicate of the PDDL language.
ExistsExp This class implements an existential expression of the PDDL language.
ForallExp This class implements an universal expression of the PDDL language.
ImplyExp This class is implemented by all implication expression of the PDDL langage.
ListExp This abstract class implements the common part of the conjunctive and disjunctive expression of the PDDL language.
NotAtomicFormula This class implements negative atomic formula of the PDDL language.
NotExp This class is implemented by all negative expression in the PDDL language.
OrExp This generic class is implemented by all disjunctive PDDL expression.
PrefExp This class implements the common methods of all preference expressions of the PDDL language.
QuantifiedExp This abstract class is extended by all quantified expression.
WhenExp This class implements a conditional expression of the PDDL language.
 

Enum Summary
ExpID This enumeration list all expression id used in the pddl language.
 

Package pddl4j.exp Description

This package contains the classes relative to the PDDL expressions.
